body: At 1st level, your touch can disrupt the bonds that hold a summoned or called creature on this plane. As a melee touch attack, you can cause a summoned or called creature to become shaken and staggered for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your wizard level (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.
name: Unstable Bonds
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Wizard/Focused Arcane Schools/Banishment School/Unstable Bonds
